__e: Oh, I recall you often, wondering if you'd thank me or curse me for putting you on that ship, whether the Army had made you or destroyed you.
I have far too much to do here to think of you very much at all.
When you're not with me, I think about you a lot.
I probably think about her... about as much as she thinks about me.
Anyhow, I'm just thinking about you.
- I think about her all the time.
I just don't wear it that often.
When you're not with me, I think about you a lot.
I miss the time when I had you to myself every day.
If something should happen... Maybe I never said this enough. I love all of you.
I don't know if I've said it enough, but I'm glad you're back.
You keep saying this all the time.
Enough to know I don't want to do it any more.
I just don't think we say it enough, and I'm really sorry for that.
He just wasn't around often enough for it to be like that.
I've been giving him some extra air time. - He's good.
I had no idea you spent that much time uptown.
How many times a week people tell you you suck?
And they've been in the news a lot lately.
You are on the news a lot.
You said it yourself yesterday, I'm on the news a lot.
I had no idea you spent that much time uptown.
I haven't said that much in my life, but I am.
I don't know how many ways to say it.
I don't know how many ways to tell you, but I don't see it.
I don't know how many times I can say it.
So I want to see him while I can.
I love myself as often as I can.
I don't know how many times I can say it.
I don't know how many times I have to tell you this.
I don't know how many times I have to tell you I'm fine.
-"A loan oft loses both itself and friend."
I suppose that you deal with death quite a bit in your line of work, don't you?
I've dealt with a lot of death in my life.
My dad used to bring me here when I was a kid, remember?
Yeah. My dad used to bring me up here.
You have done this to me again and again, Peter.
I did this way too many times with my father, but I'll only do it once for you.
I just want you to get some separation. From him.
Yeah, well, I'm not talking to her twice a day.
I can't come, how many times do I need to repeat myself?
How many times do I have to tell you I don't want him?
I can't come, how many times do I need to repeat myself?
How many times do I have to tell you I don't want him?
